name: Hologuardians
description:
Swap between real and fake copies of your self to defeat your enemies! Use your holograms to switch weapons in this top-down shooter.

All assets were created by members in this project for this game.

Credits:

Brad "BradMakeGames" Parfitt (https://brad-make-games.itch.io/)

Joey "Joeyloveswaffles" Schmidt(https://joeyloveswaffles.itch.io/)
